Sadguru Riteshwar Ji Maharaj is an Indian spiritual teacher and author associated with Hindu religious traditions.
Biography
Sadguru Riteshwar Ji Maharaj has spoken at the Radha Madhav Mahotsav and Guru Purnima Mahotsav in India and in Nepal, Scotland, South Africa, Australia, and Canada. He is the founder of Shri Anandam Dham, a Vrindavan-based organization involved in spiritual education and community outreach. The organization has participated in campaigns related to environmental conservation and substance abuse awareness among youth.
In 2022, a biographical work titled LIFE BEYOND COMPLICATIONS – tête-à-tête with Sadguru Shri Riteshwar was published by Vaidehi Taman, an Indian journalist and editor of Afternoon Voice.
